casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Charles R. GOODSON. No. 182P10-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Jan. 28, 2016. Charles R. Goodson, Bunn, for Goodson, Charles R. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 20th of July 2015 by Defendant to Proceed In Forma Pauperis: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of January 2016." ERVIN, J. recused.
